selling_plan_groups_found.title: Preorder Plans
selling_plan_groups_found.description: Manage your preorder selling plans and their configurations.

no_selling_plan_groups_found.description: It looks like you don't have any preorder selling plans configured. To configure a preorder selling plan, click the button below.

create_selling_plan_group_modal.title: Create Preorder Selling Plan
create_selling_plan_group_modal.description: You can use this form to create a new selling plan for a specific product or even a selection of products.

edit_selling_plan_group_modal.title: Edit Preorder Selling Plan
edit_selling_plan_group_modal.description: You can use this form to edit a pre-existing selling plan for a specific product or even a selection of products.

delete_selling_plan_group_modal.title: Delete Preorder Selling Plan
delete_selling_plan_group_modal.description: Are you sure you want to delete the preorder selling plan for the following products:

selling_plan_group_form.select_products: Your preorder plan will apply to the following products:
selling_plan_group_form.no_selected_products: No products selected, click the button to add products.

card.title: Take control of your product launches
card.description: Dropdeck is the smarter way to manage preorders on Shopify. Set limits, control fulfillment windows, and build hypeâ€”without the headaches. Designed for merchants who want flexibility, insight, and conversion-focused tools that just work.

row.select_all: Select all orders with release date {{date}}
